title: gOvindA ninnAnanda
sahitya:
gOvindA ninnAnanda sakala sAdhanavu


caraNam 1    aNurENu trNa kASTa paripUrNa gOvinda nirmalAtmakanAgi iruvude Ananda
    caraNam 2    shrSTi sthiti laua kAraNa gOvinda I pari mahimeya tiLiyuvude Ananda
    caraNam 3    mangaLa mahima shrI purandara viTTala hingde dAsara salahuvade Ananda
